title: Huge FPS Drops for no Reason
body: shouldve posted this when it started but for the past week for no real reason every id say 10-15 minutes my game will go from 120 fps (put a max on it) to about 3 for almost a minute,i have to go sit at base while my team fights or pushes because i dont want to die just because i cant really do anything, and before anyone says to do the obviuos things im pretty sure ive done everything,update drivers,delete malaware,patch the game,lower my settings,nothing has helped,and then when i come back to the client after the game it just crashes,not sure if its my computer or the client,anyone who has had this before and fixed please help.

replies.body:
If you're running windows 10, this could definitely be caused by one of the windows updates that enabled a few different features recently. One of the most prominent has been the anniversary update that enabled *game dvr* in the xbox game bar. I strongly recommend [disabling the game bar entirely](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) since it could be causing this issue.

Let me know if this helped.
Im running windows 8, although the problem seems to have fixed itself just by itself
ok thanks ill give it a try, you wont hear back from me if it works

UPDATE*

my game crashed as i joined a game and i as i restarted my client it said "compatability settings have changed" i hit run program quickly as i was irritated about the client crashing, then the very next game and almost every game after that the lag would happen

I recommend [disabling any compatibility settings](http://www.windows10forums.com/articles/compatibility-mode.7/) League may be configured to run with. Additionally, [upgrade to Windows 8.1](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/15356/windows-8-install-update-kb-2919355) if you haven't, since Windows 8 is not supported.

Let me know if anything changes.
